org.activebpel.rt.bpel
Interface IAeActivity

All Superinterfaces:
IAeBpelObject, IAeLocatableObject
All Known Subinterfaces:

All Known Implementing Classes:
AeActivityImpl, AeBusinessProcess
public interface IAeActivity
extends IAeBpelObject

Describes the interface used for interacting with business process activities

Method Summary
 void terminateEarly()
          Terminates the activity without the activity completing abnormally or executing its fault handler.

Method Detail

terminateEarly

public void terminateEarly()
                    throws AeBusinessProcessException
Terminates the activity without the activity completing abnormally or executing its fault handler. This is used for the root activity within a loop activity that gets terminated as a result of a continue or break activity executing within the loop.

Throws:
AeBusinessProcessException
